entry.title: [BHS5/BHS7][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 29, 15:00 - 16:00 UTC

May 7, 15:15 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 29/05/2025 15:00 UTC
End time : 29/05/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 10 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.

From 15:00 UTC to 15:10 UTC, the maintenance may temporarily affect availability of servers

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are: T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are: B710 and B716

Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services.

We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G

entry.title: [RBX][Network] - Network core equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 19, 20:00 UTC  -  May 20, 05:00 UTC

Apr 25, 15:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 19, 2025.

Start time : 19/05/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment.

This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below :
Step 1 : Preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours)
Step 2 : Deployment of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours)
Step 3 : Testing and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [LIM1][Infrastructure] - Room L111 & L112 incident notification
entry.content:
May 12, 14:41 UTC
Resolved - We had an incident on Infrastructure which has now been resolved.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 11/05/2025 21:05 UTC
End time : 11/05/2025 23:21 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : An increase in the temperature of the racks in these rooms has caused some of the servers to reboot.
Customers Impact : The cooling system was temporarily affected for some servers, which may result in downtime or reduced performance.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX4][Network] - vRack multiple racks incident notification.
entry.content:
May 7, 09:11 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the racks 56C02/56C03/56C04/56C05/56C07/56C08/56C09/56C10/56C11/56C12/56C13/56C14/56C15/56C16 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/05/2025 08:14 UTC
End time : 07/05/2025 09:04 UTC
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a hardware.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

May 7, 08:52 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A fix is being in progress.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

May 7, 08:41 UTC
Update - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our vRack offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the racks : 56C02/56C03/56C04/56C05/56C07/56C08/56C09/56C10/56C11/56C12/56C13/56C14/56C15/56C16

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 07/05/2025 08:14 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : vRack is unreachable in these racks
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their vRack (Private Network) located in these specified racks.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

May 7, 08:35 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Private Network offer in the specific racks : .
56C02/56C03/56C04/56C05/56C07/56C08/56C09/56C10/56C11/56C12/56C13/56C14/56C15/56C16
Start time : 07/05/2025 08:14 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
